posts.post_content:
ADDITIONAL 10% OFF FROM PRICES LISTED BELOW


I'm refocusing my T206s efforts from Tolstois-only to working on the monster520 (within certain fixed parameters). Being so, i've decided to move a bunch of my tolstois to undertake this much bigger project. 

All prices below are net to me - if you want to do good/services, add 3%. All prices are shipped.

PSA Tolstois:

Ty Cobb Bat Off - PSA 2.5: SOLD
Eddie Collins - PSA 2: SOLD

Al Bridwell With Cap - PSA 3: SOLD

[quote name="Luke" post=1857179]Justin, I'll take Strang.[/QUOTE]

you got it luke. let me know if you need my PayPal again. i have your address already and will ship out today.
sales pending on Cobb and Duffy.

One time bump. 
Knock 10% off the prices listed in original post.

sent PM thanks.

Collins came today- great looking card! Thanks and super quick shippping- positive feedback on the BST transaction
